tooltips.pendingVerification: Truck is pending VAHAN verification. This will be completed within 24 hours.
tooltips.blocked: Truck is blocked from bidding. See reasons below.
tooltips.allowed: Truck is verified and allowed to bid.
tooltips.gpsStale: GPS tracking is stale. Truck cannot bid until GPS is active.
tooltips.permitExpiring: Permit is expiring soon. Please renew.
tooltips.duplicateChassis: Chassis number matches another truck. This is a duplicate.
tooltips.invalidBody: Body type is not allowed (Tipper, Tanker, etc.)
tooltips.trailerNoTractor: Trailer must be linked to a tractor before bidding.
